quest.name: Of Graveyards and Gremlins
journal:
 Quest Sync
Joanric is at wit's end.
objectives: Survey the designated locations and defeat any gremlins that appear.

dialogue.name: JOANRIC
dialogue.text: Oh, good traveler, thank the gods you're here! You simply must help deliver us from our unending nightmare. I speak, of course, of those godsdamned gremlins who keep sneaking in to defile the graves behind our fort.

dialogue.name: JOANRIC
dialogue.text: Time and again have I and my fellow guards chased them away, only to see them come back in hordes, cackling and sniggering all the way.

dialogue.name: JOANRIC
dialogue.text: As if that weren't bad enough, they continuously berate us with an array of vulgar aspersions that─rather surprisingly given their limited intellect─more often than not hit painfully close to home.

dialogue.name: JOANRIC
dialogue.text: Why, it's gotten so bad that I─er, one of our men that was definitely not me spent the night crying into his pillow after the last such attack!

dialogue.name: JOANRIC
dialogue.text: But I can tell you're not one to let their words wound you, am I right? Of course I am! So I beg of you: go forth to the graveyard and be the gremlin-smiting hero we need!

dialogue.name: JOANRIC
dialogue.text: I can just hear those godsdamned gremlins out there, sniggering at me and telling me what I should do to my amaro! Make it stop...oh, good gods, make it stop!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can neither see nor hear any sign of gremlins here...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Lick the spittle from the floors, lickspittle!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Yer lower than piss on the privy!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Is that sorry blow the best ye got?

dialogue.name: JOANRIC
dialogue.text: Do my ears deceive me? The tittering and snickering is no more... Could it be? Dare I dream? Have you put an end to the gremlin menace once and for all!? O, glorious─ Ahem. That is to say, thank you, traveler. All of Fort Jobb is in your debt!

dialogue.name: JOANRIC
dialogue.text: ...Forgive me, I get carried away when the topic turns to those nasty buggers. Speaking of which, do you ever wonder where they came from? I could swear I never saw one of them before the Flood.

dialogue.name: JOANRIC
dialogue.text: I heard someone saying that they first started popping up after the Crystarium was built. That they came out of the tower. As for the truth, who can say, but all I know is that they're not bothering us anymore, and that's good enough for me!
